name.description: Name of the runner. Must be between 1 and 64 characters and may only contain upper and lowercase letters a-z, numbers 0-9, '.', '-', and '_'.

runner_group_id.description: The existing runner group to add this runner to.

maximum_runners.description: The maximum amount of runners to scale up to. Runners will not auto-scale above this number. Use this setting to limit your cost.

enable_static_ip.description: Whether this runner should be updated with a static public IP. Note limit on account. To list limits on account, use `GET actions/hosted-runners/limits`

id.description: The unique identifier of the hosted runner.

name.description: The name of the hosted runner.

runner_group_id.description: The unique identifier of the group that the hosted runner belongs to.

platform.description: The operating system of the image.

maximum_runners.description: The maximum amount of hosted runners. Runners will not scale automatically above this number. Use this setting to limit your cost.

public_ip_enabled.description: Whether public IP is enabled for the hosted runners.

public_ips.description: The public IP ranges when public IP is enabled for the hosted runners.

last_active_on.description: The time at which the runner was last used, in ISO 8601 format.

nullable-actions-hosted-runner-pool-imag.title: GitHub-hosted runner image details.
nullable-actions-hosted-runner-pool-imag.description: Provides details of a hosted runner image

id.description: The ID of the image. Use this ID for the `image` parameter when creating a new larger runner.

actions-hosted-runner-machine-spec.title: Github-owned VM details.
actions-hosted-runner-machine-spec.description: Provides details of a particular machine spec.

id.description: The ID used for the `size` parameter when creating a new runner.

memory_gb.description: The available RAM for the machine spec.

storage_gb.description: The available SSD storage for the machine spec.

public-ip.title: Public IP for a GitHub-hosted larger runners.
public-ip.description: Provides details of Public IP for a GitHub-hosted larger runners

prefix.description: The prefix for the public IP.

length.description: The length of the IP prefix.
